Title: Requires a criminal court to release a defendant charged with certain offenses involving marihuana on his or her own recognizance upon ordering a case adjourned in contemplation of dismissal
Summary: Requires a criminal court to release a defendant charged with certain offenses involving marihuana on his or her own recognizance upon ordering a case adjourned in contemplation of dismissal.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to adjournments in contemplation of dismissal in cases involving marihuana
